runbook
*******


Description
===========

Runbook definition. Runbooks allow you to capture procedural tasks for
handling a workflow. Only active versions of runbook will be available
for executions.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* export

* export-runbook-transfer-runbook-object-storage-bucket-content-
  details

* export-runbook-transfer-runbook-par-url-content-details

* export-runbook-version

* export-runbook-version-transfer-runbook-object-storage-bucket-
  content-details

* export-runbook-version-transfer-runbook-par-url-content-details

* get

* publish

* set-default

* update
